version_description: Performance Improvements.

This by far has been one of our most exciting updates to Omvana. The Team has been working hard to bring you a whole new set of experiences.

You can now meditate using your Apple Watch.

Here are some of the amazing features we added to Omvana:

Apple Watch
- Access your Mindfulness Quotient in a Glance
- Meditate to your favourite tracks using Apple Watch
- Handoff to your phone to continue meditating

iOS 8
We are introducing Mindfulness Quotient to Omvana. This will help you measure your session and keep you motivated to meditate everyday.

That's not all, to make your experience seamless between your iPhone and Apple watch we have implemented handoffs.

Using Apple’s handoffs you can now easily continue using Omvana on your iPhone from where you left off on your Apple Watch.

To continue using Omvana on your iPhone from your Apple watch, just find the Omvana icon on the bottom left of your iPhone lock screen. Swipe up on this icon, and you’ll be automatically brought back to where you left off on the watch.

Omvana is now completely compatible with Watch OS2 and iOS 9.

We have also made performance improvements.

-Performance Improvements
-Minor Bug Fixes
- Bug fixes
Fixes issue with HealthKit usage in iOS 11.
- Increased reliability using app in iOS 11.

** What's new
- Compatibility with iPhone X
- Fixes restore countdown timeout before restore is completed
- Fix on random crash when clicking on item in the Store
- Fix issues mute icon is missing when tapped on mixer screen
- Fix issues mixer is not aligned on different device

- Fix random crash when reopening the app after idle
- Fix random crash when changing the track
- Fix random crash when visiting the store for the first time
- Improved usage off command center for both ambience/vocal

Presenting to you… the new Omvana

# Explore what made Omvana the #1 Health & Fitness app in over 30 countries with over 2 million downloads (and counting). Now with a single annual subscription, get access to a growing library of 500+ meditation tracks covering the entire spectrum of life – in mind, body, spirit, and work.

# Mix and match your favorite guided meditations with a different background ambient sound for a customized experience every time you press play.

# Connect Omvana to the Apple Healthkit to see how your practice is impacting your health and wellbeing and set Daily Reminders so you never miss a session.

# Start your free 7-day trial today and experience the full version of Omvana risk-free.

And MORE: Purchased a track in previous versions of this app? Good news – The first 12 months of the full version Omvana is on us. Just click on "Upgrade here" in the initial screen.

Presenting to you… the new Omvana with a new subscription model. Unlock the entire library for $49/year.


# Explore what made Omvana the #1 Health & Fitness app in over 30 countries with over 2 million downloads (and counting). Now with a single annual subscription, get access to a growing library of 500+ meditation tracks covering the entire spectrum of life – in mind, body, spirit, and work.

# Mix and match your favorite guided meditations with a different background ambient sound for a customized experience every time you press play.

# Connect Omvana to the Apple Healthkit to see how your practice is impacting your health and wellbeing and set Daily Reminders so you never miss a session.

# Start your free 7-day trial today and experience the full version of Omvana risk-free.

And MORE: Purchased a track in previous versions of this app? Good news – The first 12 months of the full version Omvana is on us. Just click on "Upgrade here" in the initial screen.

Note: users who previously purchased individual tracks and opt to not keep the subscription still keep access to their purchased tracks.

Presenting to you… the new Omvana with a new subscription model.

We fixed a few issues and improved the overall experience of the app by listening to your feedbacks:

- Previously purchased media will appear in the library under "My purchased tracks"
- Offline tracks will have a downloaded indicator on top left
- Fixed issue that would prevent today tab to load on the first time
- Ambient sounds are infinite and will show an infinite icon
- Fixed issue that would make some tracks to load forever while playing

In order to restore your previously purchased tracks, go to: Profile->Settings->Restore Purchases

Presenting to you… the new Omvana with a new subscription model.
We fixed a few issues and improved the overall experience of the app by listening to your feedbacks:

- Enabled Saving tracks for previously purchased content
- Fixed ordering of Owned content in Library (it will be shown at the top, after Saved tracks)
- Improved usability of tooltips when using the player for the first time
- Improved overall appearance of the app with highlighted content

In order to restore your previously purchased tracks, go to: Profile->Settings->Restore Purchases

In this release:

- Fixed Offline Mode issues;
- All Logged in Users (free or not) now can favorite tracks;
- Added dynamic link for shared media;
- Progress bar Touch more responsible;
- Faster Loading for mixer sound sampling, playback, and covers;

—-
We are constantly improving the app experience by listening to your feedback. Just send us a message at support@omvana.com.
If things are great, share some love and rate 5 stars!

Thank you for your support -Omvana Team

In this release:

- Improved favouriting/unfavouriting media
- Fixed loading issues with mixer sounds
- Fixed sign up with Facebook
- Improved Curated Series layout for bigger iPhone screens
- Fixed reminders not being triggered after second day

—-
We are constantly improving the app experience by listening to your feedback. Just send us a message at support@omvana.com.
If things are great, share some love and rate 5 stars!

Thank you for your support -Omvana Team

NEW FEATURE
Classes feature
- Featured classes - availability of classes are being presented on the front line page of classes
and showcasing the most valuable content desired to the users
- Class information, where users are capable to find these information for every class they desire to intake
- Optional class trailer, these videos are being presented as part of the class to guide the users what to expect
- Fresh design layout that presents all lessons inside a class
- Linked author page has been included for every class and showcase other relative courses and meditation tracks they offer to the users
- Continue lessons, on today's tab users are capable of proceeding where they left off within any particular class
- Library cleanup that includes removal all lower quality sounds and other media

---
does not affect frontend

- Enabling rich push notifications
- Inverted subscription price size to comply with Apple request

FIXES
- Other minor app improvements & performance

What's new?

- Classes! Learn how to accelerate your growth in every area of your life with bite-sized daily lessons, including:
The 6-Phase Meditation: Envision and achieve success each day while adopting a meditation habit in just 7 days.
Extrarordinary by Design: Learn how to set the right goals that push you forward in all 12 areas of your life.
Silva Life System: Awaken your mind's full potential with the lessons of the father of personal growth, Jose Silva.

- Author Profiles. Now, you can find your favourite authors and all their tracks with one push of a button.

Can you help us improve? We'd love to answer your questions and hear your feedback at ask@omvana.com

Welcome to Omvana 4.0 

While you are meditating to better yourself, we are working hard to simplify and improve your experience.

- The Sounds tab is here: A dedicated tab with new sounds to Sleep, Chill, Meditate and other goals!

- Allies are now on the Meditation Tab under "Featured Authors": Now on the author page, you will find all the content they have available on the app.

- The New Player: Improvements to make the experience smoother and faster loading of the tracks.

- Other minor improvements

-- We'd love to hear from you --

We value your feedback, so send us your feedback and ideas at ask@omvana.com. If you’re enjoying the app, please leave us a rating and review

Welcome to Omvana 4.0 

While you are meditating to better yourself, we are working hard to simplify and improve your experience.

• We have added some new content to help elevate you spiritually! We will let you know which meditations have a higher focus on spirituality via a "Spiritual Content" tag.

• The preview is now more dynamic and gives you a short description of the meditation. You can download it or share it before starting your practice.

• Save your favorite meditations by clicking on the heart icon, and you can listen to them offline. You can also see all your downloaded meditations on your profile tab.

-- We'd love to hear from you --

We value your feedback, so send us your feedback and ideas at ask@omvana.com. If you’re enjoying the app, please leave us a rating and review.

What’s New:  
Do you feel lost inside the Omvana Library? Do you look at it and think: "Where do I begin"?

Worry not. Our brand new recommendations are here!

Select the focus areas you wish to improve on, and the app will craft a journey designed for your specific goals.

We aren't talking about adorable cat videos to keep you inside the app forever. We are talking about one meditation a day designed to keep your head in the game! This way, you can work on your goals and then happily go about your day ;)

 • Bug Fixes
 • Other: Minor improvements
